channel.title: Comments on: Meanwhile…
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Jane
item.description:
Will,I feel so hard to read this article,so many hard words in it,could you help me with the article when you come back from Thailand,ok? Will,take care of yourself,i will be worrying about you all the time.
Pukie
item.content:encoded:
Will,I feel so hard to read this article,so many hard words in it,could you help me with the article when you come back from Thailand,ok?
Will,take care of yourself,i will be worrying about you all the time.

Pukie

item.title: by: Laurah
item.description: Remind me to lock up the puppies when you come over.
item.content:encoded: Remind me to lock up the puppies when you come over.
